'Raw' is a 2005 compilation album by rapper Juvenile. It features mostly songs
the rapper made before his 1997 signing with Cash Money Records. The album was
released digitally on the May 23, 2005. Popular singles include "Bounce For The
Juvenile", "Yeah F***in' Right" and "Got It Going On".
